column5: You will be glad you rented here! Everything you need while you are on vacation or looking for your own home. Great for couples, friends and family. Comfortable and cozy best describe this home with plenty of room throughout the home. Quite while you sit on the back porch and BBQ or lounge inside. Just a quick drive will put you in Historic quaint downtown McKinney for lively night life or delicious food. 10-30 minutes away from so much more.
column8: Hm base 4 your DFW stay. Charming rental McKinney
